create.name: Image Creation
create.description: Generate new and unique images from text prompts using powerful AI models.

edit.name: Image Editing
edit.description: Use generative AI to edit your images with simple text prompts.

fuse.name: Fuse Photos
fuse.description: Creatively merge multiples photos into a single, artistic masterpiece.

restoration.name: Photo Restoration
restoration.description: Bring old and damaged photos back to life by removing scratches and restoring color.
restoration.customPrompt: Restore this photograph to its original quality. Remove scratches, enhance details, correct colors, and make it look as close to the original as possible when it was first taken.

figurine.name: Figurine
figurine.description: Transform your 2D images into 3D models ready for any project.
figurine.customPrompt: First ask me to upload an image and then create a 1/7 scale commercialized figurine of the characters in the picture, in a realistic style, in a real environment. The figurine is placed on a computer desk. The figurine has a round transparent acrylic base, with no text on the base. The content on the computer screen is a 3D modeling process of this figurine. Next to the computer screen is a toy packaging box, designed in a style reminiscent of high-quality collectible figures, printed with original artwork. The packaging features two-dimensional flat illustrations.

3d-map.name: 3D Map
3d-map.description: Transform your 2D maps into 3D models ready for any project.
3d-map.customPrompt: 用這個地圖的位置，在地標上面蓋「3D等距透視」的建築物，建築物要彼此要連起來，風格是動畫黏土風
